points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

case.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
case.localized_title: Le service est fourni "en l'état" et doit être utilisé aux seuls risques des utilisateurs.
case.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

points.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
points.analysis: Full quote: "Examples of such information we automatically collect include Internet Protocol address (“IP Address”), a unique user ID, device and browser types and identifiers, referring and exit page addresses,"

case.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
case.localized_title: Ce service permet de savoir quelle page web vous a renvoyé vers lui
case.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.

points.title: This service collects your IP address for location use

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille votre adresse IP à des fins de localisation.

points.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

case.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont regroupées dans des statistiques
case.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.

points.title: The service provides a complete list of all cookies set by its website

case.title: A list of all cookies set by the website is provided
case.localized_title: Le service fournit une liste complète de tous les cookies installés sur son site web.
case.description: The service provides users with a complete list of all first and third party cookies its website sets and an explanation of their uses. This information can be valuable for users to make an informed choice whether to allow those cookies.

points.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

case.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des détails sur les types d'informations personnelles qu'il collecte
case.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

points.title: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions
points.analysis: This excerpt is located within Twitch's description about how they collect Personal Data.

case.title: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions
case.localized_title: Le service peut collecter des données supplémentaires vous concernant par le biais de promotions
case.description: Additional personal data may be collected through contests, surveys, promotions, petitions or sweepstakes.

points.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.localized_title: le suivi via des cookies de tiers à d'autres fins sans votre consentement.
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Ce service utilise des cookies de tiers pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: Users shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service

case.title: You shall not interfere with another person's enjoyment of the service
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs ne doivent pas interférer avec la jouissance du service par une autre personne.
case.description:
Users are asked not to interfere with another person't enjoyment in using the service.
However, this statement is very vague and open to interpretation by the service itself.

points.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

case.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
case.localized_title: Les conditions peuvent être modifiées à tout moment, à leur discrétion, sans notification à l'utilisateur.
case.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

case.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
case.localized_title: Vous avez le droit de quitter ce service à tout moment
case.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

points.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.localized_title: Le blocage des cookies peut limiter votre capacité à utiliser le service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

points.title: This service retains rights to your content even after you stop using your account

case.title: This service retains rights to your content even after you stop using your account
case.localized_title: Ce service conserve les droits sur votre contenu même après que vous ayez cessé d'utiliser votre compte
case.description: The service may still use your content and display it after you stopped using it by closing your account, since you granted them a perpetual or (in some cases) an unlimited license over that content.

points.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

case.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
case.localized_title: Ce service peut utiliser vos informations personnelles à des fins de marketing
case.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.

points.title: The service allows you to opt out of providing personal information to third parties

case.title: You can opt out of providing personal information to third parties
case.localized_title: Le service vous permet de refuser de fournir des informations personnelles à des tiers.
case.description: The Service provides opt-out instructions to the share of (some) personal information with third parties.

points.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service n'est accessible qu'aux utilisateurs ayant dépassé un certain âge.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

case.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez refuser les communications promotionnelles
case.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.

points.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

case.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
case.localized_title: Ce service peut conserver des données à caractère personnel après une demande d'effacement pour des raisons d'intérêt commercial ou d'obligations légales.
case.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)

points.title: Your personal data is given to third parties

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont communiquées à des tiers
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.

case.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.
case.localized_title: Au lieu de vous le demander directement, ce service présumera que vous avez donné votre consentement en fonction de l'usage que vous en faites.
case.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.

points.title: Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim

case.title: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim
case.localized_title: Fournit des instructions sur la manière de soumettre une demande de droits d'auteur
case.description: If content that you own is copied or made accessible through the service in a way that constitutes an intellectual property right infringement, you can report it following the instructions given in the agreements.

points.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties

case.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties
case.localized_title: Vous ne pouvez pas distribuer ou divulguer votre compte à des tiers
case.description: In this context third-parties refers to anyone including friends, family, or company

points.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

case.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs s'engagent à ne pas utiliser le service à des fins illégales
case.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.

points.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

case.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs s'engagent à ne pas soumettre de contenu diffamatoire, harcelant ou menaçant
case.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.

points.title: This service prohibits users from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

case.title: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
case.localized_title: Ce service interdit aux utilisateurs de tenter d'obtenir un accès non autorisé à d'autres systèmes informatiques
case.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.

points.title: This service prohibits users sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

case.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
case.localized_title: Ce service interdit aux utilisateurs d'envoyer des chaînes de lettres, du courrier indésirable, du spam ou tout autre message non sollicité.
case.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.

points.title: Spidering or crawling is not allowed

case.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
case.localized_title: Le "spidering" ou "crawling" n'est pas autorisé.

points.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents

case.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
case.localized_title: Ce service ne cautionne aucune idée contenue dans les contenus générés par les utilisateurs.

points.title: This service can license user content to third parties

case.title: Your content can be licensed to third parties
case.localized_title: Ce service peut concéder des licences sur le contenu des utilisateurs à des tiers
case.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.

points.title: defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination

case.title: Defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination
case.localized_title: défendre, indemniser, dégager de toute responsabilité ; survit à la résiliation

points.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers

case.title: The service is not responsible for linked or (clearly) quoted content from third-party content providers
case.localized_title: Le service n'est pas responsable des liens ou des contenus (clairement) cités par des fournisseurs de contenu tiers.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des accords.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

case.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
case.localized_title: Le service ne garantit pas l'exactitude ou la fiabilité des informations fournies
case.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.

points.title: Users have 1 year to take legal action against the service

case.title: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs disposent d'un délai d'un an pour intenter une action en justice contre le service
case.description: If you wish to bring legal action against a service about a past incident, you may not be able to do so if the Terms you agreed to implied a limited amount of time. As a result it may be worthy to carefully read that section of the Terms to know exactly how much time you might have before your right to take legal action expires.

points.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

case.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
case.localized_title: La nullité d'une partie des conditions d'utilisation n'entraîne pas la nullité de la partie restante
case.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in California, USA.

case.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
case.localized_title: La juridiction qui régit les conditions d'utilisation est celle de la Californie, aux États-Unis.
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").

points.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

case.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
case.localized_title: Le fait de ne pas appliquer une disposition des conditions d'utilisation ne constitue pas une renonciation à cette disposition.
case.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.

points.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements

case.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
case.localized_title: Ce service ne garantit pas que lui-même ou les produits obtenus par son intermédiaire répondent aux attentes ou aux exigences des utilisateurs
case.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.

points.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

case.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
case.localized_title: Toute responsabilité au nom du service est limitée aux frais que vous avez payés en tant qu'utilisateur.

points.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes

case.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
case.localized_title: Ce service oblige les utilisateurs à recourir à l'arbitrage obligatoire en cas de litige
case.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.

points.title: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice

case.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
case.localized_title: Le service peut supprimer un contenu spécifique sans raison et peut le faire sans préavis
case.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.

points.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Le service peut utiliser des pixels de suivi, des balises web, des empreintes de navigateur et/ou des empreintes d'appareil pour les utilisateurs.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations

case.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
case.localized_title: Les tiers utilisés par le service sont soumis à des obligations de confidentialité
case.description: The Third Parties accessing your personal information must keep it confidential and only use it for limited purposes.

points.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content

case.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
case.localized_title: Interdit l'affichage de contenu pornographique
case.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.

points.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
points.analysis: "Unless otherwise agreed to in a written agreement between you and Twitch that was signed by an authorized representative of Twitch, if you submit, transmit, display, perform, post, or store User Content using the Twitch Services, you grant Twitch and its sub-licensees, to the furthest extent and for the maximum duration permitted by applicable law (including in perpetuity if permitted under applicable law), an unrestricted, worldwide, irrevocable, fully sub-licenseable, nonexclusive, and royalty-free right to:[...]"

case.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
case.localized_title: Le service dispose d'une utilisation non exclusive de votre contenu
case.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.

points.title: Users are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses they may incur by downloading materials

case.title: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs sont responsables des risques, dommages ou pertes qu'ils peuvent encourir en téléchargeant du matériel
case.description: Users are responsible for any harm to their computer system or loss of data they may incur through the download of materials from the service.

points.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille des informations sur vous par l'intermédiaire de tiers
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: This service allows you to retrieve an archive of your data

case.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
case.localized_title: Ce service vous permet de récupérer une archive de vos données
case.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

case.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
case.localized_title: Le service peut vendre ou transférer d'une autre manière vos données personnelles dans le cadre d'une procédure de faillite ou d'un autre type de transaction financière.
case.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.

points.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

case.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez refuser la publicité ciblée
case.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.

points.title: This service requires first-party cookies

case.title: First-party cookies are used
case.localized_title: Ce service nécessite des cookies de première partie
case.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

points.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

case.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des informations sur la manière dont il collecte les données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.

points.title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

case.title: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions
case.localized_title: Ce service utilise des cookies de tiers, mais avec des instructions d'exclusion.

points.title: The service uses social media cookies/pixels

case.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
case.localized_title: Le service utilise des cookies/pixels de médias sociaux
case.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.

points.title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online

case.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online
case.localized_title: Le service informe les utilisateurs des risques liés à la publication d'informations personnelles en ligne.

points.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

case.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
case.localized_title: Ce service ignore l'en-tête Do Not Track (DNT) et suit les utilisateurs même s'ils ont activé cet en-tête.
case.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des conditions.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

case.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
case.localized_title: Vous êtes responsable du maintien de la sécurité de votre compte et des activités qui s'y déroulent
case.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

points.title: The service can distribute your content through any media known now or in the future

case.title: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future
case.localized_title: Le service peut distribuer votre contenu par le biais de tous les médias connus aujourd'hui ou à l'avenir.

points.title: Your profile is combined across various products

case.title: Your profile is combined across various products
case.localized_title: Votre profil est combiné à différents produits
case.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.

points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

case.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
case.localized_title: Vous acceptez de défendre, d'indemniser et de dégager le service de toute responsabilité en cas de réclamation liée à votre utilisation du service.

points.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

case.title: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason
case.localized_title: Le service peut supprimer votre compte sans préavis et sans raison.
case.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

points.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

case.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
case.localized_title: La durée de conservation des données du service est limitée au minimum nécessaire à la réalisation de ses objectifs.
case.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.

points.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
case.localized_title: Le service utilise vos données personnelles à des fins publicitaires
case.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.

points.title: The service is not transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.
points.analysis: Twitch [Bad] No promise of user notification on data disclosure.

case.title: The service is not transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve your data.
case.localized_title: Le service n'est pas transparent en ce qui concerne les demandes gouvernementales ou les enquêtes qui peuvent concerner les données des utilisateurs.
case.description: Weight was 30.
